testcase.name: Search Functionality
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to "https://www.molnlycke.com/"........................passed When user verifies the heading "Proving it every day".......................passed Then user clicks on search..................................................passed And user verifies the title "Mölnlycke | Proving it every day"..............passed Then user enters the product to be searched "biogel gloves".................passed And user verifies the searchtitle "Mölnlycke | Search"......................passed And user verifies the records count "8 results found".......................passed When user clicks on searchlink "https://www.molnlycke.com/products-and-solutions/surgical-solutions/biogel-gloves/".passed Then user exits.............................................................passed
